extends Observable<PlayerAction>

  • Constructor Details

    • Connection

      public Connection​(java.net.Socket socket, Server server)
      A connection is created with a socket and a server.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns:
      the name of the player who use this connection.

    • asyncSend

      public void asyncSend​(ServerResponse serverResponse)
      It handle a asynchronous thread that send a ServerResponse.
      Parameters:
      serverResponse - the object to send via socket.

    • send

      public void send​(ServerResponse serverResponse) throws java.io.IOException
      This is the effective send that is called in asyncSend.
      Parameters:
      serverResponse - the object to send.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Close the socket of a connection. Here the connection is effectively closed.

    • listenSocket

      public PlayerAction listenSocket()
      Used into the server during the init first player to ask him how much player he want to play with.
      Returns:
      the object received from socket if it is a playerAction.

    • run

      public void run()
      The override for the runnable interface. It ask a client for his name, add him to the lobby and start listening his messages and notify them to the message receiver.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • isAGoodName

      public boolean isAGoodName​(java.lang.String name)
      Parameters:
      name - string to check. It is the user input for his username.
      Returns:
      true if it is not empty, too long(<=16) or with spaces.
